body: Definitely one of the best drawn cocks and erotic sex scenes I've seen in any hentai, and I've seen quite a lot. Sure some might be off put by their exaggerated features, but I'd prefer more than less, way too often are hentai featuring simple dildo-style cocks with no details what-so-ever. So it's really nice to see heavily detailed, anatomically accurate scenes that flow well and aren't over filled with scene direction and onomatopoeia. (ever see those where almost 95% of the entire page has something in it and it almost gives you a headache to try and figure out whats going on) Would be nice if Yuushi Tessen  did a bit more foreskin play. but this is pretty much as good as it gets. Minus the NTR, asphyxiation sure, but the dying is a turn off. I should edit it out and offer a non-ntr version. This and Type Hatena draw the best stuff <3
the lolis and cocks here all look so delicious
You know the funny thing about this is the girls here can actually be tricked that easily
